item.title: Rolling Mind
item.description: Overview“Rolling Mind” is a mobile puzzle game designed to push the boundaries of your spatial cognition. Developed with insights from the National Institutes of Health, it focuses on mental rotation, a critical component of spatial thinking. Mental rotation entails envisioning objects from different angles in the mind’s eye. In “Rolling Mind,” players are tasked with navigating 3D objects along specified paths, challenging their capacity to visualize and manipulate spatial configurations.

item.title: Spear Master
item.description: Overview“Spear Master” was a submission for Boss Jam Game Jam 2024. It was an attempt to further develop my skills at 2D animation with boss fights. However, I overestimated my ability and didn’t manage to complete the game. 2D animations are harder than I thought…. Try it out here! Spear Master by RustyCruise Labs
